wikipedia_page.main: Jo Andrews is a former British television journalist who worked as a senior political correspondent for ITN during the 1990s and 2000s. She subsequently gained extensive experience in the charity world, as a director of the Ruben and Elisabeth Rausing Trust. She is currently the co-founder of Equileap, an Organization promoting gender equality in the workplace.

response: *Jo Andrews – former political correspondent and Deputy Political Editor at ITN
